root.name: Active Contours
root.description: Automagically segment the boundary of a nucleus or cell starting from an approximate ROI. Supports 2D and 3D images and tracking of slowly moving cells. Ideal to study cell morphodynamics.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
